song.title: Amazonas - Dynomite Mix
song.info:
Remixed and new parts added for Dynomite from PopCap games. ---> http://www.popcap.com
All music (C) Peter Hajba ( Skaven / Future Crew ). Original song composed 1994. Remix and new parts (C) 2001/2002.
Email: <peter.hajba@kolumbus.fi> WWW: http://mp3.com/skaven
00-20 - Amazonas (the original song, in-game music) 22-33 - Game Loading / Main Menu (loops to 24) 35 - Game Over (breaks to High Scores) 37 - Level Clear! (breaks to "music off" pattern) 39 - Bonus fanfare (breaks to "music off" pattern) 41 - Get Ready! 43-60 - Time Trial (loops) 62 - Music Off (silence; noteoff commands, loops) 64-69 - High Scores (loops) 71-82 - Endless Puzzle Panic! (loops) 84-92 - The Museum (loops)
